member.name: P:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.Utils.Version
member.summary: Gets the API version of Arma2NET.

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AsyncAddIn
member.summary: Represents an addin which is invoked asynchronously.

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddIn
member.summary: The abstract addin class from which all addins derive.

member.name: M:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddIn.Invoke(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden, invokes the addin and returns the result to Arma2NET.
member.param: The arguments provided to the addin from Arma2NET.
The maximum size of the result permitted. This is normally 4095.

member.name: M:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddIn.Unload
member.summary: When overridden, performs final routines before the addin is unloaded.

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddInAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that this class is to be exported to Arma2NET as an addin.

member.name: M:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddInAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates that this class is to be exported as an addin.
member.param: The name of the addin. This name will also be used as the name of the function exposed to Arma2NET.

member.name: P:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.AddInAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the addin. This name will also be used as the name of the function exposed to Arma2NET.

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.MaxResultSizeAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to a method to have it called using an argument representing the maximum result size. This attribute will only take effect on addins that derive from .

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.MethodAddIn
member.summary: Represents an addin that has its methods directly invoked by Arma2NET.

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.UnformattedResultAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to a method to suppress automatic SQF formatting of the result. This attribute will only take effect on addins that derive from .

member.name: T:Arma2Net.AddInProxy.Format
member.summary: Utility functions for representing .NET objects as SQF code and vice versa.
